title: Agent Management
description: Create and manage LLM model-based agents.
addAgentDescription: Register a new agent and set system prompt and parameters.
modelRequiredMessage: Please register a Foundation model first.
imageFileOnlyMessage: Only image files can be uploaded.
fileSizeExceededMessage: File size is too large. Please select a file under 10MB.
imageProcessingErrorMessage: An error occurred while processing the image.
modelRegistrationNotice: Please register a Foundation model first.

form.name: Agent Name
form.imageHint: Upload an image for the agent (max 5MB, recommended square image)
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description of the agent
form.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter the system prompt that defines the agent's behavior
form.agentIdPlaceholder: Enter unique ID for API calls
form.agentIdHelp: Only English letters, numbers, hyphens(-), underscores(_) allowed (3-50 characters)
form.imageHelp: Image files will be encoded as base64 and stored.
form.enableAgentHelp: When disabled, this agent cannot be used in API calls
form.publicAgentHelp: All users can use this agent
form.publicSuccessMessage: All users can now use this agent
form.privateSuccessMessage: Only authorized users can use this agent
form.enableParametersHelp: When disabled, default parameter values will be used

createSuccessMessage: New agent has been successfully registered.
updateSuccessMessage: Agent information has been successfully updated.
saveFailureMessage: An error occurred while saving the agent.
deleteFailureMessage: An error occurred while deleting the agent.
deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this agent? This action cannot be undone.
toggleFailureMessage: An error occurred while changing agent enable status.
requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields (Name, Model).
